meanings.sent1: I need three triplicates of this document for each department.
meanings.sent2: The printer produced triplicates of the report for everyone in the meeting.
meanings.sent3: It was like a magic trick - he pulled out triplicates of the same card!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room in triplicates, making everyone smile.
meanings.sent5: The shelves were filled with triplicates of the same book, creating a sense of order.

meanings.definition: To make three identical copies of something.
meanings.sent1: She triplicates important documents to ensure they are safe.
meanings.sent2: The machine can triplicate the image with just one click.
meanings.sent3: He triplicates his jokes, thinking they get funnier each time.
meanings.sent4: The artist's brush seemed to triplicate the beauty of the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The chef's recipe was so good that she decided to triplicate it for future use.
